Aerial Retreat.name: Aerial Retreat
Aerial Retreat.description:
The hippogriff makes a talon Strike, then Flies with a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its fly Speed. The hippogriff and its rider gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.evvqmXIieuMwFMJT]{Effect: Retreat (Rider)}

Antler Catapult.name: Antler Catapult
Antler Catapult.description: The elk Steps once and then makes an antlers Strike. If it moved and hits, the elk can fling its target into the space it just left, which is forced movement.

Badger Rage.name: Badger Rage
Badger Rage.description:
Requirements The badger isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging.

The badger enters a state of pure rage that lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies it can perceive, or until it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. It can't voluntarily stop raging. While raging, the badger is affected in the following ways.

  • It deals 4 additional damage with its bite attacks and 2 additional damage with its claw attacks.
  • It takes a –1 penalty to AC.
  • It can't use actions that have the concentrate trait. The animal companion can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} even while raging. After it has stopped raging, it can't use Badger Rage again for 1 minute.

Bay.name: Bay
Bay.description: The shadow hound releases an eerie bay, attempting to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} each foe in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]. These Demoralize attempts don't require a language and don't take any penalty due to not sharing a language.

Bear Hug.name: Bear Hug
Bear Hug.description:
Requirements The bear's last action was a successful claw Strike.

The bear makes another claw Strike against the same target. If this Strike hits, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, as if the bear had successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grappled} the target.

Blood Feast.name: Blood Feast
Blood Feast.description:
Your vampiric animal companion attacks a bleeding foe and drinks its blood. Your companion attempts a Strike against a creature currently taking persistent bleed damage. The Strike deals 2d8 additional damage. If the Strike hits and deals damage, your vampiric animal companion gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level that last for up to 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.q6fSAYeFEf1B5Bu7]{Effect: Blood Feast}

Boar Charge.name: Boar Charge
Boar Charge.description: The boar Strides twice in a straight line and then makes a tusk Strike. As long as it moved at least 20 feet, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.

Bony Constriction.name: Bony Constriction
Bony Constriction.description:
Requirements The constrictor has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

The skeletal constrictor deals @Damage[12[piercing]] damage to the grabbed creature with its sharp ribs; the creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|basic|against:bony-constriction] save. If the constrictor is a specialized companion, increase this damage to @Damage[20[piercing]|shortLabel]. This uses a trained DC using the constrictor's Constitution modifier, or an expert DC if the constrictor is specialized.

Bouncing Slam.name: Bouncing Slam
Bouncing Slam.description: The gibtas Leaps toward a Medium or smaller creature, landing in the creature's space and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoving} the creature. If the Shove fails, the gibtas bounces out of the target's square to an adjacent square of the target's choosing.

Bounding Retreat.name: Bounding Retreat
Bounding Retreat.description: The antelope Leaps twice. If it has a rider, it can leave them in an empty space as it Leaps out of it.

Breach.name: Breach
Breach.description: The orca Swims up to its swim Speed, then Leaps vertically out of the water up to 25 feet in the air, making a Strike against a creature at any point during the jump (this lets it attack a creature within 30 feet of the water's surface). After the Strike, the orca splashes back down into the water.

Bucking Frenzy.name: Bucking Frenzy
Bucking Frenzy.description: The war pig transforms any fear it feels into fury before kicking wildly. Reduce the war pig's frightened value by 1 (minimum 0). The war pig then makes hoof Strikes against up to three different foes within its reach. These Strikes each take a –2 penalty to their attack rolls unless the war pig began its turn with the frightened condition. Each attack counts toward the war pig's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty only increases after all the attacks have been made.

Burrowing Ambush.name: Burrowing Ambush
Burrowing Ambush.description: Your mole Burrows and makes a Strike. If the mole began its movement underground, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for this attack.

Careful Withdraw.name: Careful Withdraw
Careful Withdraw.description: The legchair carefully extricates you from a dangerous situation. It Steps twice and then Strides.

Cat Pounce.name: Cat Pounce
Cat Pounce.description: The cat Strides and then Strikes. If it was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} at the start of its Cat Pounce, it remains undetected until after the attack.

Circling Flyby.name: Circling Flyby
Circling Flyby.description: Your air elemental flies in a circle, blowing gusts at your foes before returning back to its starting position. The air elemental Flies up to half its Speed, makes two gust Strikes, then Flies up to half its Speed again to return to its original location. Both attacks count toward the air elemental's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after it makes both attacks.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description:
Requirements The snake has a smaller creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

The snake deals @Damage[12[bludgeoning]] damage to the grabbed creature; the creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|basic] save against your class DC. If the snake is a specialized animal companion, increase this damage to @Damage[20[bludgeoning]|shortLabel].

Crab Cannon.name: Crab Cannon
Crab Cannon.description: Your durian crab curls itself up tightly, taking the shape of a ball. It then launches itself with its powerful claw at a target within 20 feet. When it lands, it makes a claw Strike, except the damage is bludgeoning instead of piercing. On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round and the Strike deals an additional @Damage[1d8[untyped]] damage, or 2d8 additional damage if your crab is specialized.

Darting Attack.name: Darting Attack
Darting Attack.description: The raptor Steps up to 10 feet and then Strikes, or Strikes and then Steps up to 10 feet.

Darting Stab.name: Darting Stab
Darting Stab.description: The giant wasp Flies up to 15 feet and then Strikes, or Strikes and then Flies up to 15 feet.

Death Roll.name: Death Roll
Death Roll.description:
Requirements The crocodile has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

The crocodile tucks its legs and rolls rapidly, twisting its victim. It makes a jaws Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll against the grabbed creature. If it hits, it also knocks the creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If it misses, it releases the creature.

Death from Above.name: Death from Above
Death from Above.description: The flying squirrel crashes down onto a target, furiously clawing at it. The flying squirrel falls to an empty space next to the target, taking no damage, and makes two claw Strikes. Both attacks count toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks have been made.

Defensive Curl.name: Defensive Curl
Defensive Curl.description: The pangolin coils into a ball to defend itself. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC. Any creature that hits the pangolin with a melee unarmed attack while it's in its Defensive Curl take [[/r 2d6[persistent,bleed]]] damage. The pangolin can't move, use its unarmed attacks, or take other actions that require it to use its limbs while in its Defensive Curl, but it can unfurl as a single action, ending the effects of Defensive Curl.

Defensive Curl (Hermit Krait).name: Defensive Curl (Hermit Krait)
Defensive Curl (Hermit Krait).description: The hermit krait pulls its heads into its shell to protect itself. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and a +4 circumstance bonus to any check to pretend to be a mundane shell. Any creature that hits the hermit krait with a melee unarmed attack while it's in its Defensive Curl takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,poison]] damage as one of the krait's heads lashes out from within the shell. While in its shell, the hermit krait can't move or take other actions that require using its limbs, but it can extend out of the shell as a single action, ending the effects of Defensive Curl.

Disgusting Gallop.name: Disgusting Gallop
Disgusting Gallop.description:
The zombie mount Strides twice, spraying putrid spittle as it runs. Once during this movement, choose a creature adjacent to the zombie mount. The spittle splashes on it, and the creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:disgusting-gallop] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

The creature is then temporarily immune to the spittle for 24 hours. This uses a trained DC using the zombie mount's Constitution modifier, or an expert DC if the mount is specialized.

Distracting Spray.name: Distracting Spray
Distracting Spray.description:
The capybara sprays an adjacent target with its scent glands. The target must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:distracting-spray] save. Wiping off the musk takes an Interact action and ends the effect. This uses a trained DC using the capybara's Constitution modifier or an expert DC if the capybara is specialized.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is clumsy 1 for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 1 minute.

Diving Skewer.name: Diving Skewer
Diving Skewer.description: The wyvern Flies up to half its Speed and then makes a stinger Strike. If the Strike hits, the target is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If the Strike critically succeeds, the target also takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,poison]] damage.

2.text: The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,poison]] damage.

Drench.name: Drench
Drench.description: Your water elemental drenches nearby fires to extinguish them. Your elemental puts out all fires in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5]. It extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to counteract magical fires (its counteract modifier is equal to its attack modifier with its wave Strike, unmodified by any bonuses or effects that apply to attack rolls).

Extend Pseudopod.name: Extend Pseudopod
Extend Pseudopod.description: Your chair lengthens itself, granting its pseudopod Strike the reach 10 feet trait until the beginning of your next turn.

Feast on the Fallen.name: Feast on the Fallen
Feast on the Fallen.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger A creature adjacent to the vulture is reduced to 0 Hit Points

The vulture consumes a piece of the defeated foe, regaining @Damage[18[healing]] Hit Points. If the vulture is a specialized animal companion, increase the Hit Points regained to @Damage[30[healing]|shortLabel].

Fire Breath.name: Fire Breath
Fire Breath.description:
Frequency once per hour

The riding drake breathes a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of fire, dealing @Damage[(max(1,floor(@actor.level/2)))d6[fire]|options:area-damage]{1d6 fire damage for every 2 levels} the drake has to all creatures in the area (@Check[reflex|basic|options:area-effect|against:fire-breath] save). This uses a trained DC using the drake's Constitution modifier or an expert DC if the drake is specialized.

Flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
Flamethrower.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

The fire elemental makes a tendril Strike against all creatures in a @Template[type:line|distance:60], even those that aren't in the tendril Strike's reach. All these Strikes count toward the fire elemental's multiple attack penalty, but it doesn't increase until all the Strikes.

Float.name: Float
Float.description:
Trigger The umbrella mushroom is falling.

The umbrella mushroom inflates buoyant air bladders and begins rotating to arrest the fall. It slows its descent to 60 feet per round. It can take this reaction even when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

Flower Dance.name: Flower Dance
Flower Dance.description: The sundaflora stands tall on its hind legs and begins to wave and dance, showing off its dazzling beauty to distract your attackers. It attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} the target creature, using its [[/act feint skill=performance]]{Performance } skill instead of Deception. If successful (or critically successful), the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to you, rather than to your sundaflora.

Flyby Attack.name: Flyby Attack
Flyby Attack.description: The bird Flies and makes a talon Strike at any point along the way.

Flying Strafe.name: Flying Strafe
Flying Strafe.description: The griffon Flies up to its fly Speed and makes two talon Strikes at any point, each against a different creature.

Frightening Display.name: Frightening Display
Frightening Display.description: Your ape makes a loud and frightening display, throwing a foe off balance. The ape attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} the target creature; this display gains the visual trait and doesn't require language. While @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} by this ability, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to your ape.

Gallop.name: Gallop
Gallop.description: The horse Strides twice at a +10-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

Gnash.name: Gnash
Gnash.description:
Requirements The severed head's last action was a successful jaws Strike.

Your severed head violently shakes itself back and forth, trying to tear away a mouthful of flesh. It makes another jaws Strike against the same target. If the Strike hits, it deals @Damage[1d6[persistent,bleed]] damage in addition to its usual damage.

Gnaw.name: Gnaw
Gnaw.description:
Requirements The animal companion's last action was a successful jaws Strike.

The Strike's target takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,bleed]] damage and takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed until it removes the bleed damage. If the hyena is a specialized animal companion, the persistent bleed damage increases to @Damage[2d6[persistent,bleed]|shortLabel].

Grab and Sting.name: Grab and Sting
Grab and Sting.description: The scorpion holds its foe in place with its pincers in order to sting it. It makes a pincer Strike. If the Strike hits, the target creature automatically becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the scorpion, which then makes a stinger Strike against it. The grabbed condition lasts until the end of your next turn.

Grabbing Branches.name: Grabbing Branches
Grabbing Branches.description: Your wood elemental surrounds a foe with branches, grabbing it in place. Your wood elemental makes a branch Strike; on a success, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the wood elemental until the end of your next turn unless your wood elemental moves or the target Escapes.

Grabbing Trunk.name: Grabbing Trunk
Grabbing Trunk.description: The elephant grabs its foe with its trunk and carries it off. The elephant uses Athletics to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a creature up to two sizes smaller than the elephant in its trunk. If its target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, the elephant repositions the target to another space in the elephant's reach.

Grip Throat.name: Grip Throat
Grip Throat.description: The hand attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a Medium or smaller creature by the throat. If the Grapple succeeds, in addition to the normal effects, the creature has difficulty speaking. While it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by the hand, it must spend an extra action to perform any action that has the verbal trait.

Gulp Blood.name: Gulp Blood
Gulp Blood.description:
Requirements The water wraith's last action was a successful jaws attack against a foe.

The water wraith gains 2d8 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 round, and the foe takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,bleed]] damage. If the water wraith has a specialization, the water wraith instead gains 3d8 temporary Hit Points, and the target takes @Damage[3d6[persistent,bleed]] damage. If the targeted creature has absolutely no vital fluids, this ability might not function, at the GM's discretion.

Hair Barrage.name: Hair Barrage
Hair Barrage.description: The tarantula flicks its legs, flinging spiky hairs in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. This deals @Damage[(4 + max(0,floor((@actor.level - 6) / 4)))d6[piercing]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|against:hair-barrage|basic:true]. This uses a trained DC using the tarantula's Dexterity modifier or an expert DC if the tarantula is specialized. This damage increases by an additional 1d6 for every 4 levels you have beyond 6th.

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.description: The beetle moves at incredible speed. It Strides three times.

Knock Aside.name: Knock Aside
Knock Aside.description:
Requirements The animal companion's last action was a successful headbutt Strike.

The goat automatically pushes the target back 5 feet, or 10 feet if the required Strike was a critical hit.

Liberating Bite.name: Liberating Bite
Liberating Bite.description: The mongoose makes a jaws Strike that can help creatures break free of restraint, like the grasp of a cobra. If the Strike hits, each creature grappled or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by the target can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} as a free action.

Lizard Leap.name: Lizard Leap
Lizard Leap.description: The keulia Leaps and then makes a bite Strike. As long as it moved at least 10 feet, its Strike deals an additional @Damage[1d6[piercing]] damage, or @Damage[2d6[piercing]] damage if your keulia is nimble or savage.

Long Stomp.name: Long Stomp
Long Stomp.description: Your giraffe Strides twice and then makes a hoof Strike. As long as it moved at least 20 feet, it deals an additional @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage. Increase this to @Damage[2d6[bludgeoning]|shortLabel] if your giraffe is specialized.

Lumbering Knockdown.name: Lumbering Knockdown
Lumbering Knockdown.description: Your triceratops Strides up to 10 feet, then makes a horns Strike. On a success, the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Lurching Rush.name: Lurching Rush
Lurching Rush.description: The monitor lizard Strides and then makes a jaws Strike. If it moved at least 20 feet away from its starting position, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this attack roll.

Overwhelm.name: Overwhelm
Overwhelm.description: The tyrannosaurus bears down on an enemy and pins it with its jaws. The tyrannosaurus makes a jaws Strike; on a hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Pick at the Meat.name: Pick at the Meat
Pick at the Meat.description:
Requirements The animal companion's last action was a successful jaws Strike.

Your bird picks at the wound it just created. The target of its jaws Strike takes @Damage[1d8[bleed]] damage, or @Damage[2d8[bleed]] damage if the bird is specialized.

Poisonous Sweep.name: Poisonous Sweep
Poisonous Sweep.description: The salamander secretes poison from the glands on its tail and bludgeons an enemy to apply it to them. It makes a tail Strike. If the Strike hits, the target takes an additional @Damage[1d6[persistent,poison]] damage. If your salamander is nimble or savage, increase this damage to @Damage[2d6[persistent,poison]] damage.

Possessing Strike.name: Possessing Strike
Possessing Strike.description:
Frequency once per hour

Your gray bladeling attempts to inject a malevolent soul fragment into a victim to seize control of their actions. The gray bladeling makes a blade Strike against a living creature. If it hits and deals damage, the target must attempt a Will saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. Regardless of the result, the target is temporarily immune to Possessing Strike for 24 hours.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target fights off the possessing soul fragment but is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round and can't use offensive actions against you or your gray bladeling.

Critical Failure As failure, but if the target takes damage from an attack or spell, the DC of the flat check to recover from the confusion is 15.

Pterosaur Swoop.name: Pterosaur Swoop
Pterosaur Swoop.description: The pterosaur Flies up to its Speed and makes one beak Strike at any point during that movement.

Raging Stampede.name: Raging Stampede
Raging Stampede.description: The yzobu Strides and then makes a horn Strike. If the Strike hits, the target is pushed 10 feet.

Rhinoceros Charge.name: Rhinoceros Charge
Rhinoceros Charge.description: The rhino Strides and makes a horn Strike at the end of its Stride. As long as the rhino moved at least 20 feet, the horn Strike deals 1d8 additional piercing damage, or 2d8 additional damage if your rhino is nimble or savage.

Rolling Charge.name: Rolling Charge
Rolling Charge.description: The cragstone bear tucks itself into a ball and Strides twice in a straight line. It can make a slam Strike against one creature it's adjacent to at any point during this movement. If the Strike is a critical hit, the target is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Rolling Knockdown.name: Rolling Knockdown
Rolling Knockdown.description: Your earth elemental rolls along the ground like a bowling ball and knocks a foe over. It Strides up to 10 feet then makes a fist Strike. If it hits, the target is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Sand Stride.name: Sand Stride
Sand Stride.description: The camel Strides twice with a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed, ignoring difficult terrain caused by rubble, sand, and uneven ground made of earth and stone.

Screaming Skull.name: Screaming Skull
Screaming Skull.description:
The skeleton removes its skull and throws it, making a jaws Strike with a range of 20 feet. Regardless of whether it hits, the target and all enemies within 10 feet must attempt a @Check[will|against:screaming-skull] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure. This uses a trained DC using the skeleton's Charisma modifier or an expert DC if the skeleton is specialized.

At the start of the skeleton's next turn, the head bounces, rolls, or flies back to reattach. The skeleton is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blind} while its head is away.

Scurry.name: Scurry
Scurry.description: Your chetamog takes any combination of two Stride or Climb actions. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

Seedpod Spring.name: Seedpod Spring
Seedpod Spring.description: A seedpod within the chair bursts and uncoils, releasing a light clump of cottony material. Your rootball chair Leaps up to 30 feet vertically or horizontally and drifts down, sinking 5 feet for every 5 feet traveled horizontally and causing you to take no falling damage. The cottony material disperses when you land.

Shred.name: Shred
Shred.description: The shark viciously rips into the wound. The target of the shark's Strike takes @Damage[1d8[slashing]] damage (@Damage[2d8[slashing]|shortLabel] for a mature shark or @Damage[3d8[slashing]|shortLabel] for a specialized companion).

Snatch.name: Snatch
Snatch.description: The roc Strikes a creature with its talon and then attempts to Grab the creature. If the Grab is successful, the roc then Flies up to half its speed, carrying that creature along with it.

Snatch and Zap.name: Snatch and Zap
Snatch and Zap.description: The Ulgrem-Lurann bites down hard and unleashes an electrical discharge. It makes a jaws Strike. If the Strike hits, the target creature automatically becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the Ulgrem-Lurann and takes @Damage[1d4[electricity]] damage (@Damage[2d4[electricity]|shortLabel] for a mature Ulgrem-Lurann or @Damage[3d4[electricity]|shortLabel] for a specialized companion). The grabbed condition lasts until the end of your next turn, though the Ulgrem-Lurann can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} to attempt to extend the duration as normal.

Spiked Bunker.name: Spiked Bunker
Spiked Bunker.description: Your metal elemental surrounds itself with protective metal spikes, hunkering down defensively. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC. Any creature that hits the metal elemental with a melee unarmed attack while it's in its Spiked Bunker takes @Damage[2d6[piercing]] damage (or @Damage[3d6[piercing]] damage if your metal elemental has a specialization). The metal elemental can't move, Strike, or take other actions that require it to use its body while in its Spiked Bunker, but it can retract the bunker as a single action, ending the effects.

Spit.name: Spit
Spit.description: The bacallia regurgitates a portion of its stomach's contents as a ranged spit Strike that deals a base of 1d6 acid damage with a range increment of 10 feet. The damage is 2d6 for a mature bacallia and 3d6 for a specialized one. A living creature hit with this Strike is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical hit).

Spring Kick.name: Spring Kick
Spring Kick.description: The kangaroo balances on its tail and lashes out with a powerful two-legged kick. The kangaroo makes a foot Strike. If it hits, the target is pushed back 10 feet. On a critical hit, they are also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Sudden Retreat.name: Sudden Retreat
Sudden Retreat.description:
The hippocampus makes a tail Strike, then Swims with a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its swim Speed. The hippocampus and its rider gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.evvqmXIieuMwFMJT]{Effect: Retreat (Rider)}

Swimming Snap.name: Swimming Snap
Swimming Snap.description: The giant eel Swims and makes a jaws Strike at any point along the way.

Tail Escape.name: Tail Escape
Tail Escape.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Requirements The giant rock tuatara is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

The giant rock tuatara detaches its tail to free itself from an enemy's grip. It automatically Escapes and can Step. It then can't use its tail slam Strike until it can regenerate its tail, which takes 10 minutes or an application of healing magic that restores Hit Points.

Tail Swipe.name: Tail Swipe
Tail Swipe.description: Your draft lizard sweeps its tail, making tail Strikes against up to two adjacent foes. Each attack counts toward the draft lizard's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty only increases after all the attacks have been made.

Take a Taste.name: Take a Taste
Take a Taste.description:
Requirements The zombie has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

The zombie tries to grasp and bite a creature. The zombie makes a jaws Strike against the creature. This Strike uses the same statistics as its normal melee Strike, except its damage die is 1d10 and it deals piercing damage.

Takedown.name: Takedown
Takedown.description:
Requirements The animal companion's last action was a successful jaws Strike.

The wolf automatically knocks the target of its jaws Strike @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Tearing Clutch.name: Tearing Clutch
Tearing Clutch.description: The terror bird makes a beak Strike; on a successful hit, the target takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,bleed]] damage.

Telekinetic Assault.name: Telekinetic Assault
Telekinetic Assault.description:
Frequency once per hour

Your ghost unleashes a flurry of emotions, causing small objects and debris to fly about in a 20‑foot emanation, dealing @Damage[(floor(@actor.level / 2))d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage]{1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 2 levels} the ghost has (@Check[reflex|basic|against:telekinetic-assault|options:area-effect] save). This uses a trained DC using the ghost's Charisma modifier or an expert DC if the ghost is specialized.

Telepathic Pounce.name: Telepathic Pounce
Telepathic Pounce.description:
The shotalashu hunts by pinning its foes with not just its claws, but with its mind as well. One creature within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[will|against:telepathic-pounce] save, with the following effects. This uses a trained DC using the shotalashu's Charisma modifier or an expert DC if the shotalashu is specialized.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a –5 foot status penalty to its Speeds for one round.

Failure The creature takes a –10 foot status penalty to its Speeds for one round. The shotalashu can then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for one round. The shotalashu can then Leap.

Throw Rock.name: Throw Rock
Throw Rock.description: The arboreal sapling Interacts to pick up a rock within reach or retrieve a stowed rock, then throws it with a ranged rock Strike that deals a base of 1d6 bludgeoning damage with a range increment of 30 feet. The damage is 2d6 for a mature arboreal sapling and 3d6 for a specialized one.

Tongue Grab.name: Tongue Grab
Tongue Grab.description: The giant frog lashes out with its tongue, making a tongue Strike. If the Strike hits, the target is automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the giant frog and pulled into a square adjacent to the frog. The grabbed condition lasts until the end of your next turn.

Tongue Pull.name: Tongue Pull
Tongue Pull.description: The cave gecko snaps out its tongue, attempting to pull a foe within 10 feet toward it. The gecko attempts an Athletics check against the foe's Fortitude DC. On a success, the cave gecko pulls the foe next to it. This movement is forced movement. On a critical success, the foe is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} until the beginning of your next turn.

Ultrasonic Scream.name: Ultrasonic Scream
Ultrasonic Scream.description:
The moth flaps its wings and emits ultrasonic squeaks that scramble the senses of nearby creatures. Choose one creature within 30 feet of the moth. That creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:ultrasonic-scream] save. This uses a trained DC using the moth's Constitution modifier or an expert DC if the moth is specialized.

Success The target treats all creatures as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} on its next attack before the start of your next turn.

Failure The target treats all creatures as concealed until the start of your next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Unnerving Screech.name: Unnerving Screech
Unnerving Screech.description:
Your skeletal bird of prey makes an earsplitting, unnatural screech, deafening and startling an enemy within 30 feet. The target must attempt a @Check[fortitude] save. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour. The frightened condition is a mental, emotion, and fear effect, but the creature can still be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} if it's immune to these.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is deafened for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target is deafened for 1 minute and frightened 1.

Critical Failure The target is deafened for 10 minutes and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Weighted Kick.name: Weighted Kick
Weighted Kick.description: Your augdunar gives a heavy kick with its hind legs, bringing the weight of its burden on the target. It makes a hoof Strike. On a successful hit, the augdunar automatically Shoves the target back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical success).

Wing Thrash.name: Wing Thrash
Wing Thrash.description: The bat thrashes wildly with its wings, making wing Strikes against up to three adjacent foes. Each attack counts toward the bat's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty only increases after all the attacks have been made.

Wrapping Tendrils.name: Wrapping Tendrils
Wrapping Tendrils.description:
Requirements The urchinpad's last action was a successful tendril Strike.

The urchinpad makes another tendril Strike against the same target. If this Strike hits, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, as if the urchinpad had successfully Grappled the target.
